newFeatures.title: Environment Based Configuration Management as Closed Preview
description: The Environment Based Configuration Management feature, introduced in Beta with **v14.0.0**, will now be available as **Closed Preview** only.

This will allow us to focus on gathering feedback and improving the final user experience before a wider rollout. As a result, automatic migration of Enhanced projects is temporarily disabled, and existing migrated projects will be reverted.
In the meantime, if you are interested in trying out this beta feature, you can reach out to your Mia-Platform referent.

improvements.title: Azure DevOps now supported for Infrastructure Projects
description: Infrastructure Projects now support Azure DevOps as a Git provider.
This addition allows you to manage your infrastructure configurations directly through Azure DevOps repositories, extending the flexibility of your Git provider integrations.
To discover more, visit the related [documentation page](/products/console/project-configuration/infrastructure-project.md).

improvements.title: Improved customization of Marketplace items
description: From now on, for on-premise installations, it is possible to define a set of regex rules to apply during [MarketplaceSync job](/infrastructure/self-hosted/installation-chart/helm-values/45_marketplace.md) with corresponding replacement values directly in the Helm chart. This allows you to precisely rewrite image registry paths as needed.
For more details, check out the [documentation](/runtime-components/overview_marketplace.md#edit-mia-platform-catalog-items).

improvements.title: Back-Lit Library
description: The new version `v1.5.20` of the back-kit library is available!
Refer to back-kit [changelog](/products/microfrontend-composer/back-kit/changelog.md) for finer-grained details of new versions.

bugFixes: Fixed partial date format on `bk-form-wizard` component

improvements.title: Orchestrator Generator Template 1.0.0
description: The Orchestrator Generator template has been published in the Marketplace.
For usage instructions and setup details, refer to the [official documentation](/products/console/company-configuration/providers/extensions/orchestrator-generator/overview.mdx)

improvements.title: Integration Connector Agent 0.4.0
description: The Integration Connector Agent received new updates to enable:
- aggregating information from Cloud Vendors (specifically GCP, AWS and Azure)

- build custom processors with Golang code, thanks to the new `rpc-plugin` processors and the [Integration Connector Agent Processor Template](https://github.com/mia-platform-marketplace/integration-connector-agent-processor)
To learn more about all the features and how to configure it, visit the [official documentation](/runtime-components/plugins/integration-connector-agent/10_overview.md).
